reactions.name: fear
reactions.body: The main character is afraid. Describe her anxiety and worry in as much detail as possible.

reactions.name: sadness
reactions.body: The main character feels sad. Describe her condition in as much detail as possible.

reactions.body: The main character is furious. Describe her condition in as much detail as possible.

reactions.name: joy
reactions.body: The main character is happy. Describe her condition in as much detail as possible.
